testsuite.name: JsonDatabaseTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #2
When a client tries to get an empty cell from the server, the server should response with 'ERROR' and the client should print that response
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test.
---
Arguments for Main: -t get -i 1
Server started! Client started! Sent: get 1
